body_html:
For transfer learning with Estimator, I recommend to checkout following two options:

  • Tensorflow Hub either directly hub layers or hub feature columns
  • warm_start_from argument of Estimator.
body_text:
For transfer learning with Estimator, I recommend to checkout following two options:

Tensorflow Hub either directly hub layers or hub feature columns
warm_start_from argument of Estimator.
body:
For transfer learning with Estimator, I recommend to checkout following two options:
* [Tensorflow Hub](https://github.com/tensorflow/hub/blob/master/tensorflow_hub) either directly hub layers or hub feature columns
* [warm_start_from](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/estimator/estimator.py#L109) argument of `Estimator`.
